quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
name: Aristotle

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
name: C.S. Lewis

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The only thing that will stop you from fulfilling your dreams is you.
name: Tom Bradley

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
name: Sam Levenson

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
name: Wayne Gretzky

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
name: William James

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
name: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
name: Roy T. Bennett

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
name: Unknown

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
name: Chinese Proverb

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
name: Will Rogers

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
name: Walt Disney

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
name: Stephen R. Covey

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
name: Confucius

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
name: Unknown

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
name: Confucius

quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
name: Norman Vaughan

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
name: Colin R. Davis

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
name: Chris Grosser

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
name: Unknown

quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
name: Gary Player

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
name: Walter Elliot
